rdf:RDF:
<rdf:Description rdf:about='http://domain/'>
	{{monument.description}}
	{{monument.numericIdentifier}}
	 Name des Architekten / dbpedia-Link 

	
		{% for address in addresses %}
		
			{{address.formatted}}
			{{address.geolocation.coordinates[0]}}
			{{address.geolocation.coordinates[1]}}
			 Baudatum 
		
		{% endfor %}
	

	{% for submonument in monument.submonuments %}
		Monument with ID {{ submonument.numericIdentifier }}
	{% endfor %}
